title: Sergei Iu. | Junior Full Stack Developer
description: Sergei Iu. - Portfolio, Junior Full Stack Developer
author: Sergei Iu.

projects.title: Ninjamir
projects.description: Ninjamir allows you to track cases and time to achieve your goal. There is also an opportunity to participate in the monthly team events, competing with other people.
projects.techs: Django | PostgreSQL | JavaScript | Bootstrap | CSS | HTML

projects.title: Spectro-Helper
projects.description: This project is dedicated to the famous collectible card game 'Spectromancer'. The application reads information from the screen and allows the player to better plan the strategy without holding enemy cards in his head.

projects.title: Tico
projects.description: Tico is a tutorial project for creating web applications using Google tables. The data from the table is downloaded, processed and graphed every month, showing the time spent by each user on achieving the goal.

achievements.title: Ready to work
achievements.description: I have never worked yet in any IT company

2023.title: Officially I am a web developer
2023.description: Find a job as a web developer

2022.title: 7 September 2022 - Meet Astro
2022.description: Thanks to Dennis Ivanov, learned about the Astro framework and created a portfolio on it (this site) for the first time.

2022.title: 1 June 2022 - Ninjamir appeared!
2022.description: For a long time I counted `Naruto` for children, but after watching decided to dedicate a whole project to it. :)

2022.title: 21 April 2022 - The dream of youth came true
2022.description: I have created the first web app `Tico`.

pets.title: Rada and Winter
pets.description: Our dog likes snow - it is soft, wet and flutters. And we love winter - the legs of the dog do not stain the floor
